testcase.title: verify sort option stickiness when various operations are performed on Related Records

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "All Databases"
I select search "Basic Search"

substeps.message: First selected option for dropDown Search Fields (row 1) is defined.
dropDown Search Fields (row 1)  Topic option is selected.
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is .
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is orca.
textInput Search Term (row 0)  'orca' text was entered.

steps.title: I perform search by field "Topic" with query "orca" on page "Basic Search"

substeps.message: First Author sort type selected from More dropdown
the sort option First Author -- A to Z was selected

steps.title: I select the non-default sort option "First Author -- A to Z" on page "Result Summary"
I access page "Full Record" for record number "1"
I click on link "related records" on page "Full Record"

substeps.message: The sort option is not sticky when we navigate to Related Records page, sort option selected on RR page : Relevance

steps.title: I check that sort option "First Author -- A to Z" is not sticky on "Related Records" page
I navigate to next page on "Related Records Summary" page

substeps.message: The sort option is not sticky when we navigate to Related Records page, sort option selected on RR page : Relevance

steps.title: I check that sort option "First Author -- A to Z" is not sticky on "Related Records" page

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .
Text of textInput Search Term is TI=oil*.
